body_html:
The symlink in the NCCL build dir doesn't always exist. I don't know what deletes it, but if the actual library is up to date, the Makefile won't recreate it.

body:
The symlink in the NCCL build dir doesn't always exist. I don't know what
deletes it, but if the actual library is up to date, the Makefile won't
recreate it.

On Wed, Dec 28, 2016 at 1:21 PM, Adam Paszke <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Wait, what. Which libnccl.so doesn't exist? The symlink in the build dir,
> or the copied one?
>
